sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; const AppointmentForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', appointmentType: '', concern: '', date: '', time: '', preferredDoctor: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert('Your appointment at ClearView Optical in Bicholim has been scheduled successfully! We look forward to seeing you.'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', appointmentType: '', concern: '', date: '', time: '', preferredDoctor: '' }); }; return (
